name: Mega Summoner
description:
Dozens of classic anime stars converge on the same world and arouse your childhood passion with brand new stories. Various formation tactics and skill combos bring you the thrilling gameplay you have never experienced before. There's nothing you cannot do in this fantastic world. Come and join the best action RPG multiplayer online battle arena.  

Use your wisdom to create the best formation, find the most proper time to cast your skills, and work out the most efficient skill combos. Everything depends on your command. Do whatever you like in this hot anime gacha game! Reveal the mysterious main story, participate in blood-surging competitions, or fight for your guild's honor and glory!  

The family of anime stars, classic scenes, and intriguing plots will bring your great memories back! However, this time, the heroes you admired before need your help! This time, collect anime stars to build your own team and challenge your friends in this real combat.  

Game Features:

  *Classic anime characters of all time
More than 50 anime heroes are waiting for you on the way of Pilgrimage. Make your childhood dreams come true, recruit your favorite characters with the brand new gacha system. Friends or foe, let's join the battle now.  

*Customize your own heroes and teams  You can customize heroes as you wish, and play like a boss in certain modes. The heroes have different roles in the game, but rules are made to break. Why a Support can't be a Marksman? 

  *Challenge the epic bosses
Various epic boss shares different attributes. You may not match with the epic boss on battle power, but don't worry! You are on the way to be tougher. Though you may not defeat them, you still got a chance to obtain bountiful rewards by challenging them.

  *Brand new gacha system Collect gems to Gacha for rare gifts to add to your collection! Various types of special events, the possibilities are endless! It's all about ensuring your gacha lasts as long as possible.
